channel.title: Help me with some message errors plz

item.title: Help me with some message errors plz
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

okay so heres my code in client.java for godwars

[code]//Godwars Cave
if(objectID == 3759){
toX = 2602;
toY = 4775;
saraKills = 0;
BandosKills = 0;
ZamKills = 0;
ArmadylKills = 0;
sM(“Welcome To GodWars - Made By MrJad”);
sM(“All of your kills have been reset”);
sM(“To get into the Saradomin Boss room, you need a rope”);
sM(“To get into the bandos boss room, you need a hammer”);
sM(“To get into the armadyl boss room, you need a rune X-bow”);
sM(“All of these items can be bought at the store at home”);
}

//Godars rope - Cave room
if(objectID == 2610){
toX = 2973;
toY = 9505;
}
if(playerHasItem(954)){
if(objectID == 2807){
if(saraKills > 19){
toX = 2757;
toY = 9321;
saraKills -= 20;
sM(“The Saradomin kills drain from you…”);
//NpcDialogue = 163;
} else
sM("You need at least 20 Saradomin kills to fight Commander

Zilyana.");
} else
sM(“You need a rope to fight the commander”);
}
if(playerHasItem(2347)){
if(objectID == 2806){
if(BandosKills > 19){
toX = 2740;
toY = 5069;
BandosKills -= 20;
sM(“All Kills Drain from you…”);
lowGFX(503, 0);
NpcDialogue = 163;
} else
sM(“You need at least 20 Bandos kills to fight General Graador.”);
} else
sM(“You need a hammer to fight the general”);
}
if(objectID == 2805){
if(ZamKills > 19){
toX = 2717;
toY = 9829;
ZamKills -= 20;
sM(“All Kills Drain from you…”);
lowGFX(503, 0);
NpcDialogue = 163;
} else
sM("You need at least 20 Zamorak kills to fight General K’rill

Tsutsaroth.");
}
if (playerHasItem(837)){
if(objectID == 2804){
if(ArmadylKills > 19){
toX = 3319;
toY = 9361;
ArmadylKills -= 20;
sM(“All Kills Drain from you…”);
lowGFX(503, 0);
NpcDialogue = 163;
} else
sM("You need at least 20 Armadyl kills to fight Commander

Kree’Arra.");
} else
sM(“You need a rune X-bow to fight the Command :[)”);
}[/code]

now all the object ids and stuff are right
so first of all, when i go into the godwars cave i get the message its supposed to give, and then it says you need a rope to fight the command, and you need a hammer to fight the general, and you need a rune x-bow to fight the commander

when i click any of the caves i get like random you need hammer or rope or rune x-bow to fight the command or general

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with some message errors plz
